image.title: Xiaomi 17 Pro MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS3.0.34.0.WBLCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 17 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 17 Pro China

Codename: pandora

Version: OS3.0.34.0.WBLCNXM | 16.0

Size: 11.6 GB

MD5: 0b9eab02f8912c8906ade2d069deb339

Changelog:
[Rear display]
New: Sugar Cube, a fun rear display wallpaper
New: Custom wallpapers now support dynamic shots and videos
New: On rear display, you can now take a screenshot with a three-finger swipe down, with multiple framed screenshot styles available
New: Generate rear display AI wallpapers and save them to Gallery in one tap
*To use this feature, update Themes to version 10.5.7.5 or later in GetApps
Themes store – Rear display: Added anime-themed and 3D wallpapers

Download: Here
